name: SEA: Somewhere Else Arena
description:
Join a server or create a new one, choose your two main spells and be ready to fight against another player in an isolated island ! In SEA you play a wizard against another wizard online in an isometric designed map : unlock new spells by killing some monsters, increase your chance to win the fight by killing monsters that give bonuses. and many other strategies you can set up to kill your enemy.

My name is Guillaume Bergerot, I am french and currently a Master's Degree student in 3D Technologies in Lyon and I hope to join a video game studio.

This game is the first game I publish and I hope you'll like to play it !

I use Unity servers with a free account so it's possible to quickly reach the maximum player count allowed in servers.

Don't hesitate to tell me in comments if you find a bug or anything else you want to say about the game !

If you want to support me, I created a Paypal donation page :  https://paypal.me/pools/c/88HnJqh6lr
